title: 8- The Takings Clause
description: To build a wall, Trump is going to need to seize private land. The Constitution has something to say about that and it’s known as the Takings Clause.
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
content:encoded: To build a wall, Trump is going to need to seize private land. The Constitution has something to say about that and it’s known as the Takings Clause.
